subject: Baseball
Families and Family Life
lead_paragraph: For the past 21 years, Joan Abramson has been selling bratwurst and beer at Brewers games. She loves her job, but not nearly as much as she loves her boss, who happens to be her son.
snippet: For the past 21 years, Joan Abramson has been selling bratwurst and beer at Brewers games. She loves her job, but not nearly as much as she loves her boss, who happens to be her son.
